author: beyond_yan
content: <@774033563732541451> Is it normal that the go-kzg-client is waiting for more than 12 hours now to contribute?

author: jsign
content: Yes, waiting time is independent of the client since depends on the lobby size which is still quite big. https://ceremony.ethereum.org/ at the top has some max estimated waiting time: that should be the same for all clients.
